mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DITY_USER ( ID, USER_NO, PASS, USER_NAME, MOBILE_NO, USER_AGE, USER_BIRTH, USER_TYPE, STATUS, BANK_NO, BANK_NAME, REAL_NAME, WX_NO, ZFB_NO, WX_FILE_URL, ZFB_FILE_URL, CRITE_TIME, CRITE_USER ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{USER_NO}, #{PASS}, #{USER_NAME}, #{MOBILE_NO}, #{USER_AGE}, #{USER_BIRTH}, #{USER_TYPE}, #{STATUS}, #{BANK_NO}, #{BANK_NAME}, #{REAL_NAME}, #{WX_NO}, #{ZFB_NO}, #{WX_FILE_URL}, #{ZFB_FILE_URL}, SYSDATE(), #{CRITE_USER} )
INSERT INTO t_dity_rottn_chrt ( ID, IMAGE_ORDER, IMAGE_NAME, FILE_URL )select #{ID},IFNULL((SELECT max(IMAGE_ORDER) FROM t_dity_rottn_chrt ), 0 ) +1, #{IMAGE_NAME},#{FILE_URL} from dual
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_DITY_ROTTN_CHRT order by IMAGE_ORDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DITY_GOODS_MS ( ID, NAME, PRICE, INTRDCT, OWN_ACNT, FILE_URL, STATUS, BUY_TIME, WT_TIME, BUY_DATE, WT_DATE, CRITE_TIME, CRITE_USER ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{NAME}, #{PRICE}, #{INTRDCT}, #{CRITE_USER}, #{FILE_URL}, 1, #{BUY_TIME}, #{WT_TIME}, #{BUY_DATE}, #{WT_DATE}, SYSDATE(), #{CRITE_USER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_GOODS_MS T SET T.NAME = #{NAME}, T.PRICE = #{PRICE}, T.INTRDCT = #{INTRDCT}, T.BUY_TIME = #{BUY_TIME}, T.WT_TIME = #{WT_TIME}, T.BUY_DATE = #{BUY_DATE}, T.WT_DATE = #{WT_DATE}, T.FILE_URL = #{FILE_URL} WHERE T.ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DITY_GOODS ( ID, NAME, PRICE, INTRDCT, GOODS_TYPE, OWN_ACNT, STATUS, FILE_URL, CRITE_TIME, CRITE_USER ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{NAME}, #{PRICE}, #{INTRDCT}, #{GOODS_TYPE}, #{CRITE_USER}, 1, #{FILE_URL}, SYSDATE(), #{CRITE_USER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_GOODS T SET T.NAME = #{NAME}, T.PRICE = #{PRICE}, T.INTRDCT = #{INTRDCT}, T.GOODS_TYPE = #{GOODS_TYPE}, T.FILE_URL = #{FILE_URL} WHERE T.ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DITY_USERDZ ( ID, USER_NO, SH_NAME, PHTONENO, DIQU, XXDZ, ISMOREN, YOUBIAN ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{USER_NO}, #{SH_NAME}, #{PHTONENO}, #{DIQU}, #{XXDZ}, #{ISMOREN}, #{YOUBIAN} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_USERDZ T SET T.SH_NAME = #{SH_NAME}, T.PHTONENO = #{PHTONENO}, T.DIQU = #{DIQU}, T.XXDZ = #{XXDZ}, T.ISMOREN = #{ISMOREN}, T.YOUBIAN = #{YOUBIAN} WHERE T.ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dity_order ( ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_PD, ORDER_PD_NAME, ORDER_PD_TYPE, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_CVAL, ORDER_CFEE, ORDER_INCOM, ORDER_EXPRESS, ORDER_USER_SEL_NO, ORDER_USER_BUY_NO, STATUS, OPTION_TIME, OPTION_USER ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{ORDER_NO}, #{ORDER_PD}, #{ORDER_PD_NAME}, #{ORDER_PD_TYPE}, #{ORDER_PRICE}, #{ORDER_CVAL}, #{ORDER_CFEE}, #{ORDER_INCOM}, null, #{ORDER_USER_SEL_NO}, #{ORDER_USER_BUY_NO}, 0, SYSDATE(), #{OPTION_USER} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.ORDER_NO, t.ORDER_PD, t.ORDER_PD_NAME, t.ORDER_PD_TYPE, CASE T.ORDER_PD_TYPE WHEN 0 THEN '非秒杀商品订单' WHEN 1 THEN '秒杀商品订单' ELSE T.ORDER_PD_TYPE END ORDER_PD_TYPE_NAME, t.ORDER_PRICE, t.ORDER_CVAL, t.ORDER_CFEE, t.ORDER_INCOM, t.ORDER_EXPRESS, t.ORDER_USER_SEL_NO, u.USER_NAME ORDER_USER_SEL_NAME, t.ORDER_USER_BUY_NO, uu.USER_NAME ORDER_USER_BUY_NAME, t.STATUS, CASE T.STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '买家未确认付款' WHEN 1 THEN '买家已确认付款' WHEN 2 THEN '卖家已确认收款' WHEN 3 THEN '卖家已发货' WHEN 4 THEN '买家已发起委托，待管理员确认委托' WHEN 5 THEN '管理员已确认委托' ELSE T.STATUS END STATUS_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(t.OPTION_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') OPTION_TIME, t.OPTION_USER FROM t_dity_order t left join t_dity_user u on t.ORDER_USER_SEL_NO=u.USER_NO left join t_dity_user uu on t.ORDER_USER_BUY_NO=uu.USER_NO where ORDER_USER_BUY_NO in( select USER_NO from t_dity_user where PARENT_NO=#{USER_NO} )

SELECT T.ID, T.USER_NO, T.PASS, T.USER_NAME, T.MOBILE_NO, T.USER_ADD, T.USER_AGE, T.USER_BIRTH, T.USER_TYPE, CASE T.USER_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '管理员' WHEN 2 THEN '普通用户' ELSE T.USER_TYPE END USER_TYPE_NAME, T.STATUS, T.BANK_NO, T.BANK_NAME, T.REAL_NAME, T.WX_NO, T.ZFB_NO, T.WX_FILE_URL, T.ZFB_FILE_URL, DATE_FORMAT(T.CRITE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CRITE_TIME, T.CRITE_USER,USR.USER_NAME CRITENM FROM T_DITY_USER T LEFT JOIN T_DITY_USER USR ON T.CRITE_USER = USR.USER_NO WHERE PARENT_NO= #{USER_NO}
